25.name: gemini-v25-pro
25.considerations: Strengths: Complex reasoning, validating performance metrics, linking optimizations to goals, long contexts, structured outputs, function/tool-use integration, quantitative analysis, hypothesis testing, experiment planning, multimodal understanding; Limitations: No live telemetry, misinterpreting / overfitting on noise, residual hallucination risk, latency on very large contexts, sensitive to ambiguity, inaccurate numeric precision; Benefits from: Clear metric definitions, baselines, and success criteria, extended tool-use for math and statistics, stepwise analysis protocol

4o.name: gpt-4-o
4o.considerations: Strengths: Reasoning and code comprehension, tracing complex interdependencies, long contexts, analytical synthesis across metrics; multimodal capability; Limitations: Hallucinations/over-assuming without explicit constraints; non-deterministic outputs; missing edge cases, limited code execution, degrading on ultra-long contexts, superficial optimizations; Benefits from: Explicit objectives, clear assumptions & constraints, internal checks on reasoning, representative examples and edge cases; structured outputs, comparing alternatives & justifying trade-offs, tooling/context like profiling data / benchmarks.

37.name: claude-3-7-sonnet
37.considerations: Strengths: Stepwise reasoning, structured outputs, architectural analysis, performance trade-off discussions, long contexts, safety-awareness, maintainable code synthesis; Limitations: Not best raw performance/depth, overly-verbose, aggressive micro-tuning, hallucinations, limited determinism, no direct execution/profiling, weaker on lower-level optimizations; Benefits from: Clear objectives and constraints, explicit environment details, profiling/benchmark data, structured plans, requests for rationale and maintainability trade-offs, schemas for outputs, iterative loops, acceptance tests, concise context and diffs, crisp success criteria.
